title: The medical trial that proved Trump wrong
description: The Recovery Trial, a nation-wide clinical study in  the UK, helped identify treatments for Covid 19 in the early months of the pandemic. Tim Harford speaks to Professor Martin Landray of Oxford University whose team established the randomised trial.
itunes:subtitle: The Recovery Trial identified drugs that did and did not help save lives.
